section.name: Describing centre and spread
section.page: In this exercise, you should summarise the difference between two distributions in terms of their different centres and spreads.
For the exercise in this page, you will need to export a data set and calculate the mean and standard deviation in an external statistical program.
The exercise in this page also asks for the mean and standard deviation of a variable, but for a subset of the individuals whose value of a second variable is within some range.
